REQ-SEC-001.title: Starting Sectors
REQ-SEC-001.notes: Foundational spec - defines starting configuration (5 sectors: Food, Ore, Petroleum, Commerce, Urban). No dependencies.

REQ-SEC-002.title: Sector Cost Scaling
REQ-SEC-002.notes: Pure formula: Cost = 8000 × (1 + Current_Count × 0.1)^1.5. Can be implemented standalone.

REQ-SEC-003.title: Eight Sector Types
REQ-SEC-003.notes: Defines 8 sector types with production profiles. Foundational definition for all sector mechanics.

REQ-SEC-004.title: Production Timing

blockers.reason: Production occurs at turn boundary; requires turn processing system to trigger resource generation

REQ-SEC-004.notes: Production timing is coupled to turn processing. Cannot work without turn system.

REQ-SEC-005.title: Sector Acquisition Action

blockers.reason: Uses cost scaling formula; can implement with fixed cost initially

REQ-SEC-005.notes: Core acquisition mechanic. Mostly self-contained once sector types are defined.

REQ-SEC-006.title: Resource Cap Handling

blockers.reason: Caps depend on resource type definitions; can implement with hardcoded resource names

REQ-SEC-006.notes: Defines caps: Food 10,000, Ore 5,000, Petroleum 3,000, Credits unlimited. Simple once resources exist.

REQ-SEC-007.title: No Maximum Sector Count
REQ-SEC-007.notes: Design decision - no hard cap on sectors. Implementation is just absence of validation.

REQ-SEC-008.title: Special Sector Stacking
REQ-SEC-008.notes: Multiple sectors of same type stack additively. Simple summation logic.

REQ-SEC-009.title: Sector Destruction in Combat

blockers.reason: Requires combat resolution framework to trigger sector destruction on defeat
Overkill bonus depends on dramatic outcome system; can implement base loss without overkill

REQ-SEC-009.notes: Formula: 1-3 sectors lost on combat defeat. Tightly coupled to combat system.

REQ-SEC-010.title: Sector Capture on Conquest

blockers.reason: Requires conquest victory condition or total defeat detection to trigger sector transfer
Uses similar sector transfer mechanics; can implement independently

REQ-SEC-010.notes: Formula: Transfer 50% of sectors on conquest. Requires victory system to detect conquest condition.

REQ-SEC-011.title: Research Sector Unlock

blockers.reason: Research sectors locked until Tech Tier 2; requires tech tree tier tracking

REQ-SEC-011.notes: Gate mechanic - Research sectors unavailable until player reaches Research Tier 2.
